original_text: God is greatly to be feared in the assembly of the saints, and to be had in reverence of all them that are about him.
korean_text: 하나님은 거룩한 자의 모임 가운데에서 매우 무서워할 이시오며 둘러 있는 모든 자 위에 더욱 두려워할 이시니이다

sentences.original_text: God is greatly to be feared
in the assembly of the saints
and to be had in reverence
of all them that are about him
